user_query: I want to fetch details of movies addressing climate change and read news articles about climate change.

TaskList.description: Fetch details of the movie 'Avatar' including its plot, characters, and themes related to climate change.
Fetch details of the movie 'The Day After Tomorrow' including its plot, characters, and themes related to climate change.
Compile a list of news articles about climate change from various online sources.
Combine the movie details from steps 1 and 2 with the news articles from step 3 into a comprehensive report.
